snippet: A surprise concert to mark World AIDS Day won’t include Bono, but will offer Bruce Springsteen, Kanye West and Carrie Underwood.
abstract: A surprise concert to mark World AIDS Day won’t include Bono, but will offer Bruce Springsteen, Kanye West and Carrie Underwood.

headline.main: U2 (Minus Bono), Springsteen and Kanye West to Play Times Square
